Dishes.name: Doner kebap
recipe: Spices: Baharat spice blend, ground cumin, Aleppo-style pepper,smoked paprika
comments: Thank you! this is a great recipe!!!

Dishes.name: Lahmacun
recipe: ½ lb uncooked store-bought organic pizza dough
½ sweet red pepper, cored, cut into chunks
½ oz fresh parsley leaves with some stem
7 oz ground lamb or ground beef
2 tbsp Private Reserve Greek extra virgin olive oil
comments: Thank you! this is a great recipe!!!

Dishes.name: Manti
recipe: For the dough:3 cup all purpose flour,1 cup warm water,1 tsp. salt,1 egg
For the filling:250 gr. (0,6 lb.) ground beef,1 medium onion, grated,Black pepper,Red pepper flakes,Salt
For the butter sauce:Butter,Tomato paste,Red pepper,Dried mints
comments: Thank you! this is a great recipe!!!
